meanings.definition: Not sticking or adhering to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The nonstick pan made cooking eggs easy.
meanings.sent2: The nonstick tape easily came off the wall.
meanings.sent3: The nonstick glue refused to hold the paper together.
meanings.sent4: Her nonstick shoes glided effortlessly on the dance floor.
meanings.sent5: The nonstick surface of the slide made it super fast and fun.

meanings.definition: A substance or coating that prevents food from sticking to a surface.
meanings.sent1: She sprayed the nonstick on the baking sheet before making cookies.
meanings.sent2: The nonstick on the frying pan made flipping pancakes a breeze.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret weapon was the nonstick for easy clean-up.
meanings.sent4: The nonstick on the grill kept the fish from clinging to the bars.
meanings.sent5: The nonstick on the spatula ensured the omelette slid off smoothly.
